patient_info: Depression,Hepatic cysts,Hepatosplenomegaly,Ascites,Splenomegaly,Weight loss,Neutropenia,Leukopenia,Anemia,Reticulocytosis,Hepatomegaly,Abdominal distention,Generalized muscle weakness,Abnormality of the abdominal wall,Poor appetite,Poikilocytosis,Anomalous splenoportal venous system,Abnormality of the gallbladder,Increased megakaryocyte count,Vertebral hyperostosis,Pedal edema,Anisocytosis,Myelofibrosis,Abnormal urinary color,Reduced granulocyte CD55 level,Reduced granulocyte CD59 level,Decreased expression of GPI-anchored proteins on the cell surface,Abnormality of mesentery morphology
golden_diagnosis: 阵发性睡眠性血红蛋白尿症/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria; PNH/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria,阵发性睡眠性血红蛋白尿症/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria; PNH/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria,Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria 2,阵发性睡眠性血红蛋白尿症/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria; PNH/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria
predict_diagnosis:
1. Chronic lymphocytic leukemia/small lymphocytic leukemia (CLL/SLL)
2. Myeloproliferative neoplasm (MPN) with portal hypertension
3. Systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE)
4. Hodgkin lymphoma
5. Follicular lymphoma
6. Non-Hodgkin lymphoma (NHL) with BRAF mutation
7. Metastatic carcinoma
8. Hemolytic uremic syndrome (HUS)
9. Immunoglobulin A (IgA) nephroproliferative disease
10. Aplastic anemia
11. Sickle cell anemia (with or without vaso-occlusive crisis)
12. Plasma cell proliferative disorder with amyloidosis
13. Hemophilia with associated liver disease
14. Pancreatic carcinoma with associated biliary tract lesion
15. Pheochromocytoma with associated hepatocyte carcinoma
16. Wilms tumor (with or without anaplastic features)
17. Gastrointestinal stromal tumor (GIST)
18. Germ cell tumor with associated testicular stromal cell tumor (TSCCT)
19. Pregnancy complications, such as hemolytic disease of the newborn or placental abruption
20. Chronic granulomatous disease (CGD) with associated pancreatic insufficiency
